EmailTemplate.name: M1000 Webinar Invitation 2014-05-28
EmailTemplate.subject: Reminder! - Webinar Invitation - Introducing M1000 Mag Meters
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
View Web Version
Join us for a webinar introducing the new M1000 mag meter.
When
Friday, May 30th (two options)
11:00 a.m. Central Register 2:00 p.m. Central Register
Presenter
Brooke Lange, product specialist, will be conducting a brief, quick-hitting webinar introducing the new M1000 mag meter.
Topic
The M1000 meter is the newest member of the ModMAG® M-Series® family, combining a general purpose detector with an amplifier representing the next generation of electromagnetic flow meter signal processing.
Attend the webinar to learn more. This webinar will be recorded and posted on the extranet for viewing at later date.
To register for the webinar:
1. Click the registration link for your on your preferred time above 2. On the next page, Click "Register". 3. On the registration form, enter your information and then click "Submit".
Once your registration has been approved, you will receive a confirmation email message with instructions on how to join the event.
As always, we welcome your input. Please feel free to contact us with any comments or suggestions you may have.
